thread.title: Girls soccer: Ranita Muriel lifts CHS to win
thread.title_full: Girls soccer: Ranita Muriel lifts CHS to win

author: Trumbull Times
title: Girls soccer: Ranita Muriel lifts CHS to win
text:
By Trumbull Times on October 5, 2015 in High School Sports , Sports Features · 0 Comments 
The Christian Heritage School of Trumbull’s girls soccer team won in a last-minute thriller in NEPSAC action on Monday in Middlebury against Westover School Both teams were back and forth throughout the game in the seesaw battle. 
With less than 10 seconds left, CHS’ Ranita Muriel netted the game winner on a counterattack breakaway. The counter was quick as goalkeeper Soph Luft, who recorded the shutout, saved a shot from Westover and quickly punted the ball to get things started. 
CHS moved to 3-1-2 on the season and will take on Watkinson School in Hartford on Wednesday. Related posts:
